title: Adding Skin Portraits to all skins
body:
**Hail, summoners! **

Let's talk about **in-game splashes**! 

Splashes, ~~those awesome images I could never hope to draw,~~ appear in several different places once you’re in the game itself. Many splash elements, such as the minimap, kill callouts, and scoreboard- **need **to remain as the base splash for gameplay clarity, quicker reads, and so on. 

_However_, the big circle next to your abilities doesn’t serve any significant gameplay purpose. Sooooo- it’s time for another wide-sweeping change!

http://i.imgur.com/v9M6yC3.png

Voila! You’ll notice that Arcade Ahri now has her respective skin splash as her portrait, as opposed to Base Ahri, as it is on Live. 

**On PBE tomorrow(ish), every single skin will now show its respective splash in this slot (and only this slot). **

And that’s it- short and sweet. Hit me with any questions and/or feedback you have! You're all great, and I hope you have a nice day.

-----

**FAQ**!
**Shouldn't this have been in five years ago or so?**

>Yeah, probably! :D 

**Isn't this a feature on ultimate skins? **

>Yeah. We’re sensitive to removing that as a unique feature on ultimate skins, but ~800 skins stand to benefit from this. 

**Does this impact the minimap, or other gameplay spaces?**

>Nope!

**What if I think the current minimap icons suck though? **

>Well, you’re kinda right. They aren’t made for that particular space, instead they’re teeny crops of huge assets, that are further downscaled. While skins will never have a place on the minimap (see the above reasons), there are changes we’re looking at to improve the standard iconography.

Except for the most recent champion.{{champion:141}} How will he be handled?

It still isn't a significant gameplay indicator for Kayn there, fortunately. It does hold the transformation UI, but that's layered on top of this. 

Right now, I have it so Gnar and Kayn utilize their skin splashes when in their base form, but upon transforming they swap to their unique transformed art.

I'm poking around trying to get more unique assets made, but that takes time and effort- so no promises there.

All the same, I'm curious as to everyone's thoughts on this.
What about Elise and Nidalee?
Their icons don't transform on Live, and both of them transform pretty rapidly over the course of the game. My gut says it would be kinda annoying flickering on your HUD.

(They should transform on live, though. As should Swain, probably. These transformations do provide gameplay information that currently _isn't_ being advertised, which I feel is simply because they're old rather than it being intentional - simply because Quinn, a new champion, had icons for both forms when she was released.)

Base Kindred is (are?) the same. Their two skins utilize crops of Lamb.
Thus perpetuating the perception that Kindred is just Lamb and Wolf is nothing but a pet {{item:3070}}

Wolf ain't no pet! 

Kindred gets around this problem on their base by having a unique asset. Without creating new assets, there isn't an elegant way to get both Lamb and Wolf in the skin crops. :(

Too bad you can't make a yin/yang of the skins. I'm sure the Design team would't need to spend more than a little bit of time on them. Made this real quickly for Shadowfire. I think i agree Galactic would need an entirely new asset. That one has weird angles.

https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/51edaaf6d47273a2c66ea1e33cd21af7c84cef430a53da5964c2794dbbd16b9b.png?w=800&h=240

To follow up on both this and your [Gnar/Kayn answer](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/AEAHb3XZ-adding-skin-portraits-to-all-skins?comment=000e0001):

If you are indeed considering unique portraits for Mega Gnar and SH Shadow Assassin & Rhaast, I seriously think you should consider making unique portraits for Kindred's skins- It's bad enough that people think that Lamb is the main character of the duo with what we have now, but putting Lamb in the spotlight with their skins as well, without letting Wolf a fair share in the portraits, would just strengthen this misconception and diminish Wolf once again.

**My suggestion?** A unique, shared portrait of the masks/faces for each of the Eternal Hunters' current and future skins (But let's start with current skins for now), similarly to the design and composition of [their base portrait](http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/6.24.1/img/champion/Kindred.png).
I think that it's just as important as unique icons for Gnar and Kayn, personally (even though you haven't decided on them either just yet).
I know for a fact that _many_ Kindred lovers will appreciate such a thing, at the very least.

-_-

Thanks for the discussion anyways, Kory! I'd like to hear _your_ thoughts on this suggestion. :>
I'll be asking around about Kindred as well. Personally, I feel that Gnar/Kayn need the attention first, but I don't want to diminish Kindred's fantasy.
